title: Sidefeel Women's Ripped Jeans Straight Leg Distressed Boyfriend Denim Pants
description: Feature: Sidefeel women's jeans with a straight leg, boyfriend fit with distressed designs, exuding a trendy look, while flatters the leg lines, offering a casual vibe and making the overall look more individualistic

Material: Crafted from premium denim, our ripped jeans are made of cotton, polyester and elastance, ensuring durability and comfort, making you feel cool and ease all day and night while you wearing them

Match: Women's trendy jeans are incredibly versatile, pairing them with a simple t-shirt or a fashionable blouse top to create a fashionable modern style, and also pairing them with a tank top to create a cool summer vibe

Occasion: Whether hanging out with friends, attending social gatherings or a lively music festival, shopping, going on vacation, or just for casual daily wear, our distressed jeans can meet all your needs, making you stand out and shine in the crowd
Style: Boyfriend jeans for women blending relaxed and a sense of forward-thinking, showcasing avant-garde individuality, suitable for spring, summer, autumn and winter
